ygData.subject: Another issue...
ygData.msgSnippet: Just posting something here that I sent to the EQ message board.  Not that I expect Alan to answer it. ... DX version confusion. The patch message says: Also,
ygData.messageBody:
Just posting something here that I sent to the EQ message board. Not that
I expect Alan to answer it.

Alan Absor said:
>>>BadHandle wrote:
DX version confusion. The patch message says:

"Also, as a reminder, all EverQuest subscribers will need to have DirectX
8.1 or better installed on their system in order to play beginning Tuesday
morning."

But the MOTD last night said that version 8.0a or later was required.

Could you please clarify which one it is? Thanks.

I sure can. It's Directx 8.0 or better. Sorry about the confusion.
<<<

Only now, you also say,

>>>Because Windows 95 does not support DirectX 8.1 and our new and
improved EverQuest engine requires the use of this version of DirectX, we
can no longer support Windows 95.
We apologize for this inconvenience but in order to play EverQuest and
enjoy the benefits of the new engine you must upgrade to Windows 98 or
greater and install DirectX 8.1.

Alan<<<

Will you be providing refunds for people who cannot upgrade to Win98 who
already purchased SoL?

How is it that the system requirements changed in between 12/03 and 12/04
anyway?

Talies the Wanderer
